Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Baju ini kurang cocok dengan celana yang saya kenakan
English Translation: This shirt is not suitable for the pants I am wearing

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya hanya memiliki kurang lima belas menit sebelum pertemuan penting
English Translation: I only have less than fifteen minutes before the important meeting

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Silakan duduk di kursi yang tersedia
English Translation: Please sit on the available chair

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya selalu memilih kursi dekat jendela saat naik pesawat
English Translation: I always choose the chair near the window when flying

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya lebih suka duduk di kursi di lorong karena mudah untuk pergi ke toilet
English Translation: I prefer to sit on the aisle seat because it's easy to go to the toilet

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Ibu saya menyukai kursi goyang di teras rumah
English Translation: My mother likes the rocking chair on the terrace

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Pusat perbelanjaan memiliki kursi penyandang cacat untuk difabel
English Translation: The shopping mall provides wheelchair for disabled people

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dia terlihat kurus setelah sakit
English Translation: He looks thin after he was sick

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dia membeli kuteks warna pink untuk menghias kuku
English Translation: She bought pink nail polish to decorate her nails

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Rumah kami penuh dengan kutu busuk pada musim hujan
English Translation: Our house is full of stink bugs during rainy season

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya takut dengan laba-laba besar di sudut ruangan
English Translation: I'm afraid of the big spider in the corner of the room

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya menaruh semua bajuku di laci pakaian ini
English Translation: I put all my clothes in this clothes drawer

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Lalat itu mengganggu saat makan di restoran
English Translation: The fly was annoying while eating at the restaurant

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Sudah malam, tolong nyalakan lampu
English Translation: It's already night, please turn on the lamp

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Ikuti lampu lalu lintas saat menyebrang jalan
English Translation: Follow the traffic light when crossing the street

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Jangan lewat saat lampu merah menyala
English Translation: Don't pass when the red light is on

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Landak laut adalah hewan laut yang memiliki banyak duri
English Translation: Sea urchin is a marine animal that has many spines

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Langit biru di musim panas sangat indah
English Translation: The blue sky in summer is very beautiful

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Kami akan berangkat hiking jika langit cerah besok
English Translation: We will go hiking if the sky is clear tomorrow

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dia terlihat sangat langsing setelah diet
English Translation: She looks very slim after the diet
